div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h3: Empowering All Students to Succeed in a Changing World

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Welcome to the Spearfish School District website. We serve approximately 2,400 students in the Spearfish community and surrounding area. Our district's mission statement, "Empowering All Students to Succeed in a Changing World," is a goal we take very seriously. The Spearfish School District provides quality programs for all ranges of academic learners.

The Spearfish School District is a positive, productive learning institution with a history of high expectations and student success. Our staff is experienced, talented and dedicated to the success of our students. The school system and community place high value on the education of our youth, and that expectation serves as a catalyst for student success in a rigorous learning environment.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
